Sources say assistant Freddie Ljungberg is ready to step in as a caretaker, but #AFC don’t plan on using that contingency [@IndyFootball]

The word from the top of the club is still that there will be no movement until the end of the season. The present likelihood is that they won’t take the option to extend Emery’s contract then, but they still won’t take action right now [@IndyFootball]

Arsenal have been trying for some time now to get Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang and Alexandre Lacazette to sign new contracts, but so far the talks have proved unsuccessful [@charles_watts]

Both Aubameyang and Lacazette want to play in the Champions League so it is no surprise that right now they are keeping their options open [@charles_watts]

Arsenal are distancing themselves from a possible move for Jose Mourinho, with Unai Emery still having the support of the club's hierarchy, sources have told ESPN FC [@LaurensJulien]

Mourinho would be keen to speak to Arsenal should Emery be sacked this season, sources have told ESPN FC, but a move for the former Chelsea and Manchester United boss appears some way off at present [@LaurensJulien]

John Cross | Arsenal want to give Emery time to turn things around this month. There is a growing fear that the club could act if they are in serious danger of missing out by Christmas.

Mirror | Arsenal could turn back to Mikel Arteta who was a contender last year but is still on the radar. [@MirrorFootball]

William Saliba played the whole game as Saint-Etienne beat Monaco 1-0.

Deyan Iliev played the whole game and kept a clean sheet as Sered drew 0-0 with DAC.
